Entries.Victor: Oh, wow! This is absolutely incredible. Thank you very much, @! I love this!/224 787 444/You're giving this to me? This is great! Thank you, @./254 346 348 349 392 394/Oh? For me? This is... nice. Thank you, @./18 16 20 22 24 408 80 416 414 412 296 398 410 152 396 397 399/Uhh... I don't like this at all, @. Sorry./205 404 420 422 609 610 196 213 218 219 225 403/Thank you for the gift, @. I really appreciate this!/184 186 180 182 174 176 424 426/

Entries.Victor0: I'm a little nervous about this? Aren't you?$4
Entries.Victor1: To think I couldn't be anymore happier...$4

BeforeMovie.Text: Ah. This should be quite an interesting film.$1

AfterMovie.Text: Really puts the world in perspective. Do you think we'll ever visit the stars someday?$1

BeforeMovie.Text: You know, I never did beat this game. I'll watch it, though!$1

AfterMovie.Text: That was great. I want to play the game now!$3

BeforeMovie.Text: I'm looking forward to this movie.$1

AfterMovie.Text: This was a wonderful idea. Which part of the movie was your favorite?$3
Must say, I did enjoy myself. I appreciate you taking me out, @.$3

BeforeMovie.Text: At least the seats are comfy...$2

AfterMovie.Text: Err. The acting wasn't the best. I expected a bit more.$2

Entries.Victor: I think Abigail is going to stomp everyone again. She always does.$0#$e#Mayor Lewis should consider asking her not to participate. It isn't fair for Vincent and Jas.$6#$e#Really, the same could be said about you too, @.$0
Hey, honey! Good luck hunting eggs today. Show those children who's boss.$1
Can you believe spring is almost over? I'm not looking forward to the summer heat.$0#$b#The beaches will be nice, though!$1

Hi there, sweetheart! Are you looking forward to seeing the dancing?$4#$b#Oh, you want to dance with me? I can't dance. You'll just dance by yourself.$1#$b#If you want to dance with someone else I wouldn't mind that.$1#$e#When we get home, we'll put on some music and dance there with you.$4
My mother and I just threw in some of our most expensive wine. It should make the soup taste delicious.$1#$e#I don't think any of the children can have any now though. Whoops.$2
We should sit next to each other and eat our soup!$4#$e#We can drink a glass of my mother's vintage wine with it!$1
These moonlight jellies travel here all the way from across the world.$3#$b#They were at the Fern Islands just a few months ago.$1
I'd like to hold your hand while looking out at the moonlight jellies.$4#$e#I love you, @.$4
That clown is only juggling one ball... How odd.$0#$e#I might go look at the grange displays soon. This is getting boring.$2#$e#Have you set your display up?$1
Hey there, honey! I hope you do well in the grange display contest!$4
Uhh... there's a skeleton monster patrolling in there by those graves.$2
Be careful in there, honey! There's a monster!$7
I must say, I'm looking forward to seeing Willy show off his fishing skills.$1#$b#You can tell how talented he is. He's been fishing all of his life!$3
Good luck in the fishing contest, sweetheart. You're going to do great!$4#$e#I'll be cheering for you!$1
I wonder if I should give her the gift now? Hmm. Timing is everything.$0
Hey, @. Umm... I have a gift for you at home.$4#$b#I'll show you tonight, okay?$4

Entries.2000000/f Victor 500/e 1000034/p Victor: jaunty/-500 -500/farmer 20 34 0 Victor 24 25 2/pause 400/skippable/showFrame Victor 37/viewport 22 27 true/move farmer 0 -7 1/pause 800/move farmer 4 0 0/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 38/pause 650/speak Victor "Oh, sorry. I didn't see you there, @!$1"/pause 300/showFrame Victor 37/pause 600/showFrame Victor 38/pause 300/speak Victor "I'm in the middle of reading an adventurer's book about the Fern Islands archipelago. You may not know this, but the Islands are full of perilous caverns.$1#$b#They wind down under the sea and are full of monsters that never emerge above ground.$3#$b#If this adventurer is to be believed, there are huge tentacle monsters and venomous floating jellyfish. It's hard to believe they made it back to write their story!$7"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 300/showFrame Victor 37/pause 750/showFrame Victor 38/pause 450/speak Victor "The clan that protects the Fern Islands is called 'The First Slash'. They wear blue cloaks and use long spears, and are led by a fierce fighter named Ekon.$1#$b#Marlon knows him.$3#$b#They coauthored another book somewhere here in the library.$0"/pause 450/question fork0 "#Have you considered joining the Adventurer's Guild?#I want to visit the islands sometime!"/fork 2000000_JoinGuild/pause 550/speak Victor "My mother and I recently took a trip to Sautine City in the Islands. The beaches are truly a sight to behold.$3#$b#I hope we get to return soon. We take a vacation or two every year, but my mother usually chooses the destination.$1"/pause 500/showFrame Victor 37/pause 600/speak Victor "I tend to get lost in my books. This collection used to be small, but over time they've built up.$3#$b#I think I've read around three quarters of the books currently in our library, but it just seems to keep growing.$0#$b#I don't think I'll ever be able to say I've read them all.$1"/pause 500/showFrame Victor 38/pause 750/speak Victor "You have my permission to read any of the books here that catch your eye, @.$3#$b#If you want to borrow one to bring home, let me know first.$1"/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1200/showFrame Victor 37/pause 2000/showFrame Victor 38/pause 1000/speak Victor "I'm going to get back to reading. Have a nice day, @. We should chat again soon!$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Victor 50/end dialogue Victor "I got further into the book about the Fern Islands. Apparently those venomous jellyfish are called Zinnes.$7#$b#There's a wizard in the Fern Islands who brews a potion that neutralizes Zinnes venom. His potion saved the adventurer's life!$1"
Entries.2000000_JoinGuild: pause 750/showFrame Victor 38/speak Victor "!!!$7#$b#Me? Joining the Adventurer's Guild? Hahahaha!$1#$b#I'm great at reading and studying monsters, but I'd be hopeless in a fight. I'll leave that to brave people like you, @.$3"/pause 1200/speak Victor "I'm thankful we have people like you to protect us. I know it's dangerous, tough work.$3"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/showFrame Victor 37/pause 1750/showFrame Victor 38/pause 1000/speak Victor "All I do is read books all day.$1#$b#This collection of books used to be small, but over time they've built up.$3#$b#I think I've read around three quarters of the books currently in our library, but it just seems to keep growing.$0#$b#I don't think I'll ever be able to say I've read them all.$1"/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 38/pause 750/speak Victor "You have my permission to read any of the books here that catch your eye, @.$3#$b#If you want to borrow one to bring home, just let me know first.$1"/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1200/showFrame Victor 37/pause 2000/showFrame Victor 38/pause 1000/speak Victor "I'm going to get back to reading. Have a nice day, @. We should chat again soon!$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Victor 50/end dialogue Victor "I got further into the book about the Fern Islands. Apparently those venomous jellyfish are called Zinnes.$7#$b#There's a wizard in the Fern Islands who brews a potion that neutralizes Zinnes venom. His potion saved the adventurer's life!$1"

Entries.2000050/z winter/w sunny/t 800 1700/f Vi: jaunty/-500 -500/farmer 15 20 1 Victor 37 20 2 Linus 66 10 0/pause 1000/animate Victor false true 120 16 17 18 17 17 18 17 17 18 18 18 17 18 17 18 17 18 18 17 17 18 17 18 17 18 17 18 17 17 17 18 18 17 18 17 18 17 18/viewport 22 20 true/viewport move 1 0 10000 true/move farmer 19 0 1 true/pause 8500/stopAnimation Victor/pause 1000/move Victor 0 0 3/pause 400/emote Victor 16/speak Victor "Hello, @! Visiting Shearwater Bridge I see.$1#$b#I'm doing some calculations on its structural integrity.$3"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 350/speak Victor "This bridge was built forty years ago, and at the time it was a triumph of engineering. It made easy travel to and from Grampleton possible for the first time.$1#$b#Bridges fascinate me. They're so simple, but can have so much impact on people's lives.$1#$b#I've built models of a few famous ones. Someday, I want to build something on this scale.$3"/pause 600/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 650/move Victor 0 0 3/pause 850/speak Victor "There's a bridge engineer in Grampleton. His name is Ralph.#$b#When he needs help, I assist him with his work to get hands-on experience.$3"/pause 800/speak Victor "The physics and mathematics that go into bridge construction need to be absolutely flawless.$6#$b#Even a tiny mistake in a single calculation could lead to a major catastrophe.$2"/pause 1500/move Victor 0 0 2/pause 1050/showFrame Victor 19/pause 1100/showFrame Victor 16/pause 1400/showFrame Victor 19/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 0/pause 600/move Victor 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Victor "I'm returning to my residence. Need to run these calculations on my computer. It's been a pleasure speaking with you, @.$1"/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/friendship Victor 50/end dialogue Victor "I ran those calculations I told you about. I think I've stumbled onto a real improvement plan for Shearwater Bridge!$1#$b#These structural upgrades could save 213,500G of maintenance costs over the next ten years. I should talk to Ralph right away!$1#$e#Doing work that takes a lot of brainpower makes me hungry. I wonder if there's leftover spaghetti.$3"

Entries.2000001/f Victor 1000/t 1030 1700/d Mon: fall_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 40 95 1 Victor 45 89 3/pause 400/skippable/animate Victor false true 2250 40 40 40 41 41/viewport 46 89 true/move farmer 4 0 0/emote farmer 8/pause 500/move farmer 3 0 0/move farmer 0 -6 3/pause 2250/speak Victor "Hi, @...$2"/pause 700/question fork0 "#Someone in your family die?#Oh... Who's grave is that?"/fork 2000001_Graveyard/switchEvent 2000001_Graveyard
Entries.2000001_Graveyard: pause 750/speak Victor "...$2"/pause 600/stopAnimation Victor/pause 1000/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 43/pause 1500/playMusic echos/pause 850/speak Victor "This is my cat's grave. His name was Dewey.$2#$b#I commissioned Robin to carve this tombstone for him, in his memory.$6#$b#Dewey went missing shortly after my mother and I moved into the valley from Zuzu City.$2"/pause 150/emote farmer 60/pause 300/speak Victor "He had just turned two years old. We... don't know what happened to him.$2#$b#When he went missing, I was devastated. The whole town came out to help try to find him, but nobody had any luck.$2"/pause 1100/speak Victor "After several weeks... we accepted that he probably wasn't coming back.$2"/pause 1250/shake Victor 1500/pause 1000/speak Victor "I should have been there for him. He must have been so scared, alone in a strange place...$2"/pause 1000/speak Victor "I hope that if he's out there, he finds his way home, no matter how much time it takes.$2"/pause 800/showFrame Victor 4/pause 750/speak Victor "I'll be here when he does.$6/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/mail VictorDewey/friendship Victor 40/end position 47 89

Entries.2000002/f Victor 1500/t 1000 1700/w sunn: spring_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 89 56 2 Victor 97 61 1/pause 400/skippable/showFrame Victor 43/viewport 95 62 true/move farmer 0 7 1/pause 1150/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/move farmer 8 0 0/pause 750/showFrame Victor 4/pause 1000/move Victor 0 0 2/pause 600/speak Victor "Hi, @.$6"/pause 400/emote farmer 40/speak Victor "Oh, what am I doing? I'm... well, just thinking at the moment. I have a lot on my mind.$6"/pause 600/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 550/showFrame Victor 43/pause 700/playMusic desolate/pause 1500/speak Victor "My mother told me she's disappointed I haven't found a job yet. I came to the park to get out of the house for a while.$2#$b#I can't blame her for feeling that way. I graduated from university a year ago and I'm still living at home.$2#$b#Maybe she thinks I'm just lazy and comfortable living at home forever because we're financially secure.$6#$b#But that's... not the case at all.$2"/pause 1100/speak Victor "Over the last year, I've turned down dozens of internships and job offers. None of them appealed to me.$2#$b#I don't want to move out of the valley and work myself to death in the city.$2#$b#I want a career where I'm free to be who I am, not who I'm told to become.$6"/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 4/pause 1000/move Victor 0 0 2/pause 750/speak Victor "You understand what I'm saying, @. You quit your office job because that wasn't true to who you were.$6#$b#You took a leap of faith and took over your grandpa's farm. Just look at how that transformed your life!$3#$b#In a way... I envy you, @.$2"/pause 1200/question fork0 "#Working at Joja was the worst.#You should move to the city and get a job."/fork 2000002_FindYourPassion/pause 800/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 43/pause 1000/speak Victor "I know there aren't many jobs here in the valley, @. You can't do much here unless you freelance or are willing to commute two hours to Zuzu City.$2#$b#Like I said before, I don't want to move away. I love living here, and I can't see myself going anywhere else.$6"/pause 1500/speak Victor "I lived in Zuzu City all my life with my parents. Moving to Stardew Valley... it was the first time I felt like I was home.$6"/pause 1250/speak Victor "Imagine how you would feel if you suddenly moved back to your city after finding this place. It'd feel like being a plant, uprooted.$6"/pause 1050/emote farmer 60/pause 600/speak Victor "Then you understand what I mean.$6"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Victor -125/end dialogue Victor "Hi, @. I appreciate you talking to me at the park. You're a good listener.$6"
Entries.2000002_FindYourPassion: pause 750/speak Victor "A career like that sounds dreadful. Having a boss telling you what to do and how to feel.$2#$b#Working that much... that's essentially over half your life that doesn't belong to you.$6"/pause 1250/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 1000/showFrame Victor 43/pause 1000/speak Victor "Sophia wouldn't understand what I'm going through...$6"/pause 1500/speak Victor "My mother and the rest of my family keep pressuring me to jump into a high-paying career. It seems like no one cares how I feel about it.$2"/pause 2000/speak Victor "There aren't many jobs here in the valley unless you freelance work or are willing to commute an hour to Zuzu City.$6#$b#That's two hours a day, with good traffic...$2"/pause 1250/showFrame Victor 4/pause 800/move Victor 0 0 2/pause 1000/speak Victor "I'm optimistic I'll figure this all out soon enough, @.$3#$e#Thanks for hearing me out. See you around.$1/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Victor 75/end dialogue Victor "Hi, @. I appreciate you talking to me at the park. You're a good listener.$3#$b#I consider you one of my closest friends.$1"

Entries.2000003/f Victor 2000/e 2000002: playful/-500 -500/farmer 10 25 0 Victor 31 25 2 Olivia 20 19 1/pause 400/skippable/showFrame Victor 37/viewport 27 16 true/move Olivia 5 0 0/pause 300/shake Olivia 500/pause 1000/move Olivia 1 0 0/pause 500/shake Olivia 400/pause 1100/textAboveHead Olivia "All done! Not a single speck left!"/pause 1350/move Olivia 5 0 0/move Olivia 0 -1 1/move Olivia 2 0 0/pause 800/textAboveHead Olivia "Victor? I'm coming in."/pause 2000/doAction 33 17/pause 600/viewport move 0 -1 7400 true/move Olivia 0 -7 0/pause 300/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 750/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 600/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 500/textAboveHead Olivia "Ugh... so dusty."/pause 1500/move Olivia 0 -2 1/move Olivia 2 0 1/pause 300/shake Olivia 400/pause 700/move Olivia 0 -1 1/pause 250/shake Olivia 500/pause 800/move Olivia 0 -1 1/pause 400/shake Olivia 400/pause 800/move Olivia 0 0 0/pause 750/emote Olivia 8/pause 600/move Olivia 0 -2 1/pause 750/emote Olivia 40/pause 500/showFrame Olivia 29/playSound newRecipe/pause 500/showFrame Olivia 30/pause 750/emote Olivia 40/pause 1000/stopMusic/speak Olivia "!!!??$7"/pause 1000/shake Olivia 1500/pause 800/speak Olivia "!!!$7"/pause 1000/playSound newRecipe/speed Olivia 4/move Olivia -2 0 2/speed Olivia 4/move Olivia 0 10 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/warp Olivia 21 27/warp farmer 16 28/move Olivia 0 0 1/viewport 27 27 true/move Olivia 2 0 1/speed Olivia 4/pause 700/shake Olivia 800/pause 1200/move Olivia 8 0 0/playMusic shaneTheme/pause 250/speak Olivia "VICTOR!!$5"/move farmer 0 0 1/showFrame Victor 38/emote Victor 16/speed farmer 4/move farmer 8 0 1 true/speak Victor "Ahh! Wh-what!?$7"/pause 600/shake Olivia 2000/pause 700/speak Olivia "YOU'VE BEEN TURNING DOWN JOB OFFERS!?$5"/pause 300/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 -2 1/move Victor 0 0 2/speed farmer 4/move farmer 2 0 2 true/speak Victor "I've been doing nothing of the sort! The job market-$7"/pause 150/speak Olivia "NO! STOP! Do NOT lie to me again, Victor. I read your diary!$5"/pause 500/speak Victor "You were snooping around my room!?$7"/pause 500/speak Olivia "I was dusting the house, and thought I'd clean your room for once. It's always a dusty wreck.$6#$b#My father is coming to visit soon, and I wanted the house to be perfect for his arrival.$6"/pause 1000/speak Olivia "I found a note that says you've been turning down internships and job offers.$5#$b#This is why you haven't found a job after graduating!? Why, Victor?$5#$b#What is the point of this charade? Don't you want to have a successful career?$2"/pause 1350/speak Victor "...$2"/pause 1850/shake Olivia 1500/pause 700/speak Olivia "ANSWER ME!$5"/pause 400/speak Victor "I DIDN'T KNOW WHAT I WANTED TO DO!$5"/pause 500/emote Olivia 16/pause 400/move Olivia 0 -1 0/pause 400/speak Olivia "That's all you have to say for yourself?! After all the money I spent sending you to Pellcar University?...$5"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 250/speak Olivia "Victor, I'm buying a one-bedroom apartment for you in Zuzu City. I'll give you some starting money, and then I'm cutting you off.$0"/pause 300/emote Victor 16/pause 500/shake Victor 1000/pause 500/speak Olivia "You're moving out, Victor. Now. Maybe being back in the city without my bank account to rely on will inspire you to start living your life.$5"/pause 500/speak Victor "Mom, no! Please, just let me explain! I have a reaso-$7"/speak Olivia "There is nothing to explain, Victor. This is for your own good.$2"/emote Victor 28/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 1/move farmer 5 0 0/pause 300/move Olivia 0 0 2/stopMusic/pause 200/emote Olivia 16/pause 200/speak Olivia "!!!$7"/pause 200/speed Victor 4/move Victor -1 0 2/speed Victor 4/move Victor 0 1 2/pause 250/speak Victor "@!?$7"/pause 600/speak Olivia "You were eavesdropping on our conversation!?$5"/pause 1000/question fork0 "#I came by to read some of Victor's books and I heard you two arguing."/fork 2000003_Eavesdropping/end
Entries.2000003_Eavesdropping: pause 500/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Victor "Mom. Please. Let me talk so you can understand my side of the story. At least give me that.$2"/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 1000/emote Olivia 40/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 1200/speak Olivia "Okay.$2"/pause 750/question fork1 "#Don't say anything#Listen to your mom and move to the city."/fork 2000003_VictorTalk/pause 500/move Victor 0 0 2/emote Victor 16/pause 400/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 300/speak Victor "!!!$7"/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 800/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Olivia "See, Victor? Even @ agrees it would be in your best interest to move to Zuzu City.$0#$b#This is the best path to get you out of this slump, honey.$0"/pause 500/move Victor 0 0 0/pause 400/shake Victor 700/pause 700/speak Victor "...$2"/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 750/speak Olivia "Thank you for your input, @. Victor and I will continue discussing this matter. Alone. You may leave.$0"/pause 500/emote Victor 28/pause 600/speed farmer 2/move farmer -6 0 3 true/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Victor -1250/end dialogue Victor "Why did you agree with my mother about sending me to Zuzu City? It took me hours to talk her down.$2#$b#I'm not just wasting my life here. I'm starting an apprenticeship with a retired bridge builder in Grampleton.$0#$b#I thought you were my friend, but you hurt my feelings and betrayed my trust...$2#$e#Don't talk to me right now, @.$5#$e#%Victor is now ignoring you."
Entries.2000003_VictorTalk: pause 1200/pause 400/showFrame Victor 43/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 1000/speak Victor "Mom...$2"/pause 600/showFrame Victor 4/pause 400/speak Victor "Mom, I enjoyed what I studied in school.$0#$b#The reason I've turned down job offers is because I know exactly what I want to do with my life, and it doesn't involve internships in the city.$6"/pause 1250/speak Victor "I want to build and maintain bridges. Not just any bridges, but the bridges here in the valley and surrounding provinces.$3"/pause 500/showFrame Victor 43/pause 600/speak Victor "This was going to be a surprise. I didn't want to tell you until it was official but...$2"/pause 100/emote Olivia 8/pause 200/showFrame Victor 4/pause 300/speak Victor "I've been working closely with Kendra, the mayor of Grampleton, and their bridge engineer, Ralph. He recently retired.$3#$b#Ralph is responsible for constructing and managing the bridges in the region, including the ones here in Pelican town.$1"/pause 150/emote Olivia 16/pause 200/speak Olivia "Are you saying you...?$6"/pause 500/speak Victor "Yes. I'm an apprentice.$1#$b#Ralph is teaching me the ins and outs of bridge construction and maintenance. I've been waiting for a position like this to open up for a long time.$3"/pause 300/speak Olivia "Honey! This is incredible news! I wish you had told me sooner.$1"/pause 400/showFrame Victor 43/pause 400/speak Victor "I thought it'd be best to tell you when it was official so I didn't get your hopes up if it didn't happen.$2#$b#But I probably should have told you sooner, since you've been so worried about my future.$2"/pause 400/showFrame Victor 4/pause 400/speak Victor "Those notes in my diary are very old, from a time when I was feeling frustrated and lacking direction. Now I know what I want to do with my life.$6"/pause 500/emote Olivia 40/pause 500/speak Olivia "...$2"/pause 650/speak Olivia "I... I'm sorry for violating your privacy, honey. It was unfair to assume you were putting off work to keep living here.$2"/pause 1250/speak Victor "Part of that is true, mother. I don't want to move away from Stardew Valley. Departing from my friends and the valley would make me miserable.$6#$b#If I had moved to the city and gotten an office job, I'd be nothing but a cog in a machine, unable to chase my dreams.$2"/pause 1100/speak Victor "I feel like I can achieve so much more if I control my own destiny. And right now, working with Ralph, I can.$1"/pause 300/speak Olivia "Honey, I'm so proud of you!$1"/pause 500/speak Victor "Thank you, mother!$3"/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "We celebrated Victor's internship with the finest aged Blue Moon Vineyard wine and exchanged laughs."/stopMusic/pause 1000/friendship Victor 50/end dialogue Victor "Hi, @. I'm sorry you got caught between my mother and me. I didn't want to let anyone know about my apprenticeship until I knew it was for certain.$6#$b#Getting the internship doesn't mean my future is secure. I have a lot of learning and work ahead of me, but I'm happy to know which direction my life is heading.$3#$e#Thank you for being a good friend.$1"

Entries.2000004/e 2000003/t 600 1150/f Victor 25: none/-500 -500/farmer -300 -300 1 Victor -301 -301 2 MarlonFay 34 104 2 Wizard 33 106 2 Krobus 32 104 2/pause 400/skippable/viewport 59 53 true/showFrame MarlonFay 12/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 2750/playSound doorClose/warp Victor 59 52/playMusic jaunty/pause 1150/textAboveHead Victor "Yawn..."/shake Victor 1000/pause 2000/move Victor 0 1 1/viewport move 1 0 3500 true/move Victor 7 0 0/pause 800/shake Victor 500/playSound trashcanlid/pause 800/textAboveHead Victor "Trash got picked up."/pause 2000/playSound trashcanlid/shake Victor 500/pause 700/move Victor 1 0 0/pause 600/playSound openBox/shake Victor 400/pause 1200/emote Victor 8/pause 600/playSound newRecipe/pause 800/emote Victor 40/pause 700/stopMusic/emote Victor 16/pause 500/jump Victor/pause 900/speed Victor 4/move Victor -9 0 3 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 5 54/warp Victor 27 54/pause 750/viewport 18 54 true/move farmer 6 0 1 true/speed Victor 4/move Victor -14 0 3 true/pause 300/emote farmer 16/speak Victor "@!!! I was just running over to your farm!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speed Victor 3/move Victor -1 0 3/speak Victor "It's official, @!$1"/pause 300/playSound newRecipe/pause 500/speak Victor "I just received my formal acceptance letter from the town of Grampleton and credentials from the Ferngil Bridge Engineering Association!$1#$b#I haven't told anyone yet. You're the first!$1"/emote farmer 16/speak Victor "Want to walk up to the summit with me?$3"/pause 400/question fork0 "#I'd love to walk up to the summit with you.#I can't. Sorry, Victor."/fork 2000004_Summit/pause 350/showFrame Victor 40/pause 750/speak Victor "Oh... that's okay. I'll see you later then.$2"/pause 1300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Victor -250/end dialogue Victor "I'm not in a good mood, @. I wanted to talk to you about something important, and it really stung when you said no.$2$e#I'll get over it soon. Talk to you later.$5#$e#Just give me some space, @.$2"
Entries.2000004_Summit: pause 400/speak Victor "!!!$1"/pause 500/speak Victor "Here, take my hand.$4"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 300/move farmer 0 1 2/move farmer 1 0 0 true/pause 200/move Victor 0 0 2/pause 250/emote Victor 20 true/pause 230/emote farmer 20 true/pause 750/speed Victor 2/move Victor 6 0 0 true/move farmer 6 0 0 true/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/warp Wizard -400 -400/warp Krobus -444 -444/warp MarlonFay -433 -433/warp farmer 15 25/warp Victor 14 25/changeLocation Summit/viewport 15 17 true/move farmer 0 -8 0 true/move Victor 0 -8 0 true/pause 4000/playSound SpringBirds/pause 400/playSound SpringBirds/pause 600/playSound SpringBirds/pause 1400/playSound SpringBirds/pause 500/playSound SpringBirds/pause 400/playSound SpringBirds/pause 1400/speak Victor "@... It feels like we just met yesterday, but we understand each other so well it's like I've known you all my life.$3"/pause 400/move farmer 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Victor "We listen to each other, inspire each other, challenge each other, and grow stronger together every day.$3#$b#I couldn't imagine a single day without you in my life.$4#$b#I've grown so much because of you... I hope I've brought you even a fraction of the joy you've brought me.$3"/pause 400/emote farmer 20/pause 200/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 400/speak Victor "You're precious to me, and you always will be.$4"/pause 100/emote Victor 20/pause 350/speak Victor "Ah, that was a little cheesy wasn't it.$0#$b#I think I've read too many romance novels.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Victor "So, I was thinking to celebrate maybe we cou-$4"/emote Victor 16 true/pause 250/playMusic junimoStarSong/animate farmer true true 9999999 101/showFrame Victor 28/emote farmer 20 true/emote Victor 20/pause 1500/viewport move 0 -1 11000 true/pause 11000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Victor "That moment on the summit was better than any scene in a book.$4#$e#I love you, @.$4"

Entries.8982809/t 800 1600: none/-500 -500/farmer 64 15 2 Victor 64 16 0/skippable/speak Victor "Greetings, @.$1#$b#My apologies for interupting your farm work.
